name: Affalds- og Ressourceindustrien
goal:
Waste and Resource Industry (ARI) is an association for companies that have professional management of waste as a primary activity. We work for framework conditions that increase their market opportunities and enhance their reputation. Waste market in Denmark must be liberalized
so that new treatment methods for the efficient recycling of waste can be developed by private companies.
euInitiatives:
Initiative on circular economy.
Directive 2008/98/EC on waste.
Waste shipments initiative.
Enforment of waste law.
